name: Course Offering Enrollments
description: Returns the course offerings within which a user is enrolled, including both explicit and implicit enrollments. Required Permission Advanced Data Sets > Can Execute Course Offering Enrollments (Organization level) Available Filters Returned Fields

columns.name: User Id
columns.description: Internal numeric user identifier within Brightspace.

columns.name: Org Unit Id
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier for the course offering.

columns.name: Role Id
columns.description: The learner's numeric role Id within the course offering.

columns.name: Enrollment Date
columns.description: The date of the learner's enrollment.
